nodes.description: banned Tehreek-e-Taliban Pakistan声称对袭击负责
nodes.support_text: Meanwhile, the banned Tehreek-e-Taliban Pakistan claimed responsibility of the attack.

nodes.description: 自杀式袭击者进入 DIG 办公楼，携带自杀背心、手榴弹和步枪
nodes.support_text: Three suicide bombers stormed into the offices of a senior police officer in a central Balochistan district on Tuesday afternoon...

nodes.description: 袭击者先在DIG入口处引爆手榴弹
nodes.support_text: The attackers detonated a hand grenade at the entrance to the complex of DIG in Loralai before storming inside...

nodes.description: 警方击毙一名袭击者，该袭击者随后自杀
nodes.support_text: The police on duty responded and shot one of three attackers at the entrance to the complex who blew himself up

nodes.description: FC Balochistan和Army部队疏散约800名正在参加警察招录考试的考生
nodes.support_text: FC Balochistan and Army troops were called in, who safely evacuated around 800 candidates

nodes.description: 军方消灭两名藏匿在房间内的自杀式袭击者
nodes.support_text: After evacuating the candidates, the troops started the operation to take out the two suicide bombers hiding in the room. They were subsequently shot dead

nodes.description: 袭击导致9人死亡（含3名警察、5名警务职员、1名考生）和21人受伤（含12名警察、9名考生）
nodes.support_text: Nine persons, including three policemen, five civil employees of police and one civilian candidate embraced shahadat. 21 people, among them 12 policemen and 9 civilian candidates, were also wounded

nodes.description: Loralai Civil Hospital接收10具尸体和21名伤者，重伤员转至Combined Military Hospital
nodes.support_text: Medical Superintendent Loralai Civil Hospital Dr Faheem said 10 bodies and 21 injured were brought to the hospital. Those critically injured were shifted to the Combined Military Hospital

nodes.description: Balochistan首席部长和其他官员谴责袭击并要求彻查
nodes.support_text: Provincial Home Minister Mir Zia Langove, provincial ministers, as well as Balochistan Chief Minister Jam Kamal Khan condemned the attack.

nodes.description: Balochistan首席部长承诺采取果断反恐行动
nodes.support_text: The chief minister called for the attack’s inquiry report, and vowed to take decisive action against terrorists.

nodes.description: Earlier this month, at least four members of the security forces were killed in an attack on a Frontier Corps training base in Loralai
nodes.support_text: Earlier this month, at least four members of the security forces were killed in an attack on a Frontier Corps training base in Loralai.

nodes.description: 执勤警察对袭击事件进行感官观察
nodes.support_text: 执勤警察回应了袭击事件

nodes.description: 剩余两名自杀式炸弹客向目标开火
nodes.support_text: 剩余两名自杀式炸弹客向目标开火

nodes.description: 剩余两名自杀式炸弹客进入侧房间
nodes.support_text: 剩余两名自杀式炸弹客进入其中一个侧房间

nodes.description: FC Balochistan和Army troops被调用协助
nodes.support_text: FC Balochistan和Army troops被调用协助

nodes.description: 袭击导致10人死亡（含9名警察）
nodes.support_text: 袭击导致10人（含9名警察）死亡

nodes.description: Nasir Shah声明袭击已致10人死亡
nodes.support_text: 洛拉莱警察局警长Nasir Shah声明袭击已致10人死亡
